name: Ever White
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
text:
Main You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader has the (Donquixote Pirates) type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. 
Counter Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
